events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it arrived the wrong size. I would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been reviewed and categorized under the Refund cluster due to the request for money back or exchange.
This case is assigned to agent Emily Rodriguez to handle the refund request and assist the customer accordingly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order issue. I’m here to help you with your refund or exchange.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the jacket you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 874325 and I’ve attached a photo showing the incorrect size label on the jacket.
Thank you for the info. We can offer a full refund or send the correct size immediately. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer to get a refund. Please proceed with it and let me know the next steps for returning the jacket.
Your refund request has been processed and you will receive the amount within 5 business days. Return label sent to your email.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing the case now as the refund was completed and customer had no further questions or issues.
